h2_title: Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Battle - Commander Beetle
content: Even when not slamming the ground, his bigger sword can also cut through the air to send a slicing wave of force at you from a distance, which comes out much faster than his slams, and can be done multiple times.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Temple_of_Yellow_Flowers_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Temple of Yellow Flowers Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Battle - Commander Beetle'.
The content is as follows:
Even when not slamming the ground, his bigger sword can also cut through the air to send a slicing wave of force at you from a distance, which comes out much faster than his slams, and can be done multiple times.
